DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the safety and efficacy of manual super small incision cataract surgery (MSSICS) and Phacoemulsification.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Manual Super Small Incision Cataract Surgery and Phacoemulsification
DOC.criteria: Age related cataract patients Cataract density grade IIIII according to the EmeryLittle system classification system Legal guardian(s) is/are not present for permission Other eye diseases impairing visual acuity (ie. glaucoma) patients with severe systemic diseases not good for ocular surgery
DOC.keyword: Manual super small incision cataract surgery
